name: White Chocolate Mousse
instruction: Melt the white chocolate in a double boiler. Whip the cream until stiff peaks form. Fold the melted chocolate and vanilla extract into the whipped cream. Chill before serving.

name: No-Bake Peanut Butter Oatmeal Bars
instruction: Mix peanut butter and honey in a saucepan over low heat until melted. Remove from heat and stir in oats. Press into a pan and top with melted chocolate chips. Chill until firm.

name: Vanilla Mug Cake
instruction: Mix all ingredients in a mug until smooth. Microwave on high for 90 seconds. Let cool slightly before eating.

name: No-Bake Strawberry Icebox Cake
instruction: Layer graham crackers, whipped cream (whipped with powdered sugar), and sliced strawberries in a dish. Repeat layers and chill for at least 4 hours before serving.

name: Easy Strawberry Sorbet
instruction: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Pour into an ice cream maker and churn according to manufacturerâ€™s instructions. Freeze until firm.

name: Microwave Peanut Butter Fudge
instruction: Melt peanut butter and butter in the microwave. Stir in powdered sugar until smooth. Pour into a lined pan and chill until firm.

name: Fluffy Key Lime Pie
instruction: Mix condensed milk and lime juice until thickened. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into crust and chill until set.

name: Chocolate Lava Mug Cake
instruction: Mix all ingredients in a mug until smooth. Microwave on high for 70-90 seconds until the cake is just set. Let cool slightly before eating.

name: Affogato
instruction: Scoop ice cream into a bowl. Pour hot espresso over the top and serve immediately.

name: Easy Fresh Strawberry Pie
instruction: Mix sugar and cornstarch in a saucepan. Add strawberries and cook until thickened. Pour into baked pie crust and chill until set.
